attributes.action: give nhs a pay rise and call a public enquiry to stop it happening again
attributes.additional_details:
parliament need to give key workers a pay rise and the NHS has been treated badly it is getting sold of little by little and we need to safe guard it 

also a public enquiry will help it happening again and we learn from our mistakes so I urge all people to sign it
attributes.background:
I would like government to give all key workers a pay rise and tax back for the past 3 months they have given everything to save lives.

I would also like a public enquiry to start asap to stop this happening again

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

Incentivise NHS staff during the COVID19 outbreak by making wages untaxable: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304595

Set up a Royal Commission into Government planning and handling of pandemics: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321251
